B

BinOpAgent - Class in configs
BinOpAgent is an agent that performs a binary operation on the last values of two input topics and publishes the result to an output topic.
BinOpAgent(String, String, String, String, BinaryOperator<Double>) - Constructor for class configs.BinOpAgent
Constructs a BinOpAgent with specified input and output topics and a binary operation.

IncAgent - Class in configs
IncAgent is an agent that subscribes to a topic, increments the received value by 1, and publishes the result to another topic.

MyHTTPServer is a custom HTTP server implementation that listens for incoming HTTP requests, manages servlets for different HTTP commands, and handles client connections in a thread pool.
